data.name: An old school adventure fps - Go To Hell Demo
data.detailed_description:
Go to hell demo D.1.6 :


Go to hell is an adventure FPS with a pixel art style, you have to find items to advance in your quest and fight against angels.


The demo is simply the beginning of the game, you can play the demo until you find the first powerup (Rush move).

How to play :

-ZQSD or WASD or Arrows to move.
-Space or Maj to Jump.
-R to reload.
-Mouse to look and Left click to shoot.
-Ctrl to Rush (you need the first item to do that).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: i5-2500k
  • Graphics: nvidia-gtx 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 136 MB available space
